alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:36PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Trumbull and southern Ashtabula Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 435 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Bloomfield, or 16 miles north of Warren, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conneaut, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Andover, Bristolville, Roaming Shores, Pierpont and Cherry Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
